Title: Windows Azure SQL
Description: This site contains tutorials and samples for Windows Azure: SQL Database, Cloud Services, Storage, Activity Directory /Access Control Service, and OData.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This site contains tutorials and samples for Windows Azure.

  • SQL Database
  • Cloud Services
    • See Migrate a WCF Data Service to Windows Azure for a step by step guide to publish and consume a Windows Azure WCF Data Service connected to an Azure SQL Database using Azure Access Control Service claims-based authentication.
  • Storage
  • Activity Directory /Access Control Service
    • See Migrate a WCF Data Service to Windows Azure which describes how to setup user name and password claims-based authentication.
  • Virtual Machines
    • See Use PowerShell to Create Windows Azure Virtual Machines with SQL Server BI.
  • OData on Windows Azure
